TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Namisan, title = Namisan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Namisan} }

S.FORM: Namisan Itiniay i Yuli Cen no Hualien ko Namisan a niyaro', 76 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 187 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 47% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 87 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 53% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 100 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 46%, Paiwan 1%.

Namisan Itiniay i Yoli Cen no Hoalien ko Namisan a niyaro', 76 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 187 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 47% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 87 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 53% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 100 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 46%, Paiwan 1%.
